data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Goiás, Brazil to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Goiás, Brazil
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 1,497,350 believers in Goiás, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 6,004,000 people living in Goiás through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 1,200 new simple churches in the state of Goiás, Brazil. Place a simple church in every community of the 6,004,000 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Tapuia people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Tapuia people.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Goiás.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Goiás, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Goiás, Brazil with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

location.name: Goiás
location.cities_list: Goiânia, Aparecida de Goiânia, Anápolis, Rio Verde, Luziânia
location.cities_list_w_pop: Goiânia (1,171,195), Aparecida de Goiânia (510,770), Anápolis (319,587), Rio Verde (229,651), Luziânia (143,601)
